::FZ/Prowl::

FZ sees Unicron blasting toward him, firing in time to detonate the 
missiles heading at him. He flies up, avoiding Unicron and firing one 
of his own missiles down at him. The missile had a glowing blue 
field, designed to bounce any beams off of it, and upon detonation it 
would create an energy field 6 feet in radius, draining any bot in 
range (same missiles that I used the last battle).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing his target flying at FZ, Prowl fires two more missiles at 
Unicron.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Unicron: 
> 
> 
> 
> The robot could feel someone watching him, and the life force of 
Unitron and 
> and those with him falling.  But he'd already sent him a plan to 
live on, and 
> knew it would work.
> 
> His entire body flashed for a second, height increased by several 
feet and 
> colors completely different.  He bursted off at incredible speed 
for one his 
> size at FZ, both fists changing into the shape of barrels, an 
> energy-signature seeking missile errupting from both of them at FZ.
